mapper.select: SELECT ymd , ccd , sejem , chasu , dose from dbo.RETU_BAN where ccd = '0151' AND ymd = '24/12/12'

SELECT ymd , ccd , sejem , chasu , dose , jenga , busu , yul , kum , gubun , bigo , or_time , bunjem , bigo_2 , lotno
FROM dbo.DELI_ORDER_TEST WHERE ccd = '0106' AND ymd = #{paramDay} AND sejem = #{paramCustCd} AND bunjem = #{paramCustsCd} AND chasu = #{paramCustSeq} ORDER BY sejem ASC

SELECT rtrim(sejem) as custCd , rtrim(s_name) as custNm , chasu as custSeq , count(*) as cnt , sum(busu) as qty , rtrim(bigo2) as custsCd
FROM dbo.RETU_BAN WHERE ccd = '0106' AND ymd = #{paramDay } GROUP BY sejem, s_name, chasu, bigo2 ORDER BY sejem, chasu

SELECT ymd as ymd , CASE WHEN ymd != '' THEN '20' + left(ymd,2) + SUBSTRING(ymd, 4, 2) + right(ymd,2) ELSE '' END dealDay , sejem as custCd , s_name as custNm , chasu as custSeq , dose as prodCd , jenga as price , busu as qty , CASE WHEN s_ilja != '' THEN '20' + left(s_ilja,2) + SUBSTRING(s_ilja, 4, 2) + right(s_ilja,2) ELSE '' END coupReturnDay , bigo1 as remarks , bigo2 as custsCd , d_name as prodNm , '9' as divCd , '' as receiptYn , '00000000' as receiptDate , '4021101' as dealFg -- 위탁코드
FROM dbo.RETU_BAN WHERE ccd = '0106' AND ymd = #{paramDay } AND sejem = #{paramCustCd } AND chasu = #{paramCustSeq } AND bigo2 = #{paramCustsCd }
